Package com.intellij

Class Patches

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.Patches

  • public class Patches
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean IBM_JDK_DISABLE_COLLECTION_BUG
      IBM JVM 1.4.2 crashes if debugger uses ObjectReference.disableCollection() and ObjectReference.enableCollection().
      static boolean JDK_BUG_EVENT_CONTROLLER_LEAK
      Enable a workaround for JDK bug with leaking TargetVM.EventController, see IDEA-163334
      static boolean JDK_BUG_ID_21275177
      Debugger hangs in trace mode with TRACE_SEND when method argument is a StringReference
      static boolean JDK_BUG_ID_6822627
      NPE from com.sun.jdi.ReferenceType#constantPool() See JDK-6822627
      static boolean JDK_BUG_ID_8032832
      Some HTTP connections lock class loaders: https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8032832 The issue claims to be fixed in 8u20, but the fix just replaces one lock with another (on a context class loader).
      static boolean JDK_BUG_ID_8042123
      Support default methods in JDI.
      static boolean JDK_BUG_ID_8147994
      Since 8u102, AWT supports Shift-scroll on all platforms (before, it only worked on macOS).
      static boolean JDK_BUG_WITH_TRACE_SEND
      Debugger hangs in trace mode with TRACE_SEND when method argument is a ThreadReference
      static boolean JDK_MAC_FONT_STYLE_BUG
      Older JDK versions could mistakenly use derived italics font, when genuine italic font was available in the system.
      static boolean JDK_MAC_FONT_STYLE_DETECTION_WORKAROUND
      JDK on Mac detects font style for system fonts based only on their name (PostScript name).
      static boolean REPAINT_MANAGER_LEAK
      A huge int[] leak through VolatileImages cached in RepaintManager whenever screen configuration changes.
      static boolean SLOW_GETTING_CLIPBOARD_CONTENTS
      See https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-4818143.
      static boolean SUN_BUG_ID_6322854
      See https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-6322854.
      static boolean SUN_BUG_ID_6486393
      Desktop API support on X Window is limited to GNOME (and even there it may work incorrectly).
      static boolean SUN_BUG_ID_8020443
      Java 7 incorrectly calculates screen insets on multi-monitor X Window configurations.
      static boolean TEXT_LAYOUT_IS_SLOW
      https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8220231

    • Field Detail

      • SUN_BUG_ID_6322854

        public static final boolean SUN_BUG_ID_6322854
        See https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-6322854. java.lang.NullPointerException: Failed to retrieve atom name.

      • IBM_JDK_DISABLE_COLLECTION_BUG

        public static final boolean IBM_JDK_DISABLE_COLLECTION_BUG
        IBM JVM 1.4.2 crashes if debugger uses ObjectReference.disableCollection() and ObjectReference.enableCollection().

      • SLOW_GETTING_CLIPBOARD_CONTENTS

        public static final boolean SLOW_GETTING_CLIPBOARD_CONTENTS
        See https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-4818143. The bug is marked as fixed but it actually isn't - Clipboard.getContents(Object) call may hang for up to 10 seconds if clipboard owner is not responding.

      • REPAINT_MANAGER_LEAK

        public static final boolean REPAINT_MANAGER_LEAK
        A huge int[] leak through VolatileImages cached in RepaintManager whenever screen configuration changes. For instance screen saver activates or computer goes hibernate. The problem still exists in 1.6 when two (or more) monitors exists

        http://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-6209673

        http://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8041654

      • SUN_BUG_ID_6486393

        public static final boolean SUN_BUG_ID_6486393
        Desktop API support on X Window is limited to GNOME (and even there it may work incorrectly). See https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-6486393.

      • SUN_BUG_ID_8020443

        public static final boolean SUN_BUG_ID_8020443
        Java 7 incorrectly calculates screen insets on multi-monitor X Window configurations. See https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8020443.

      • JDK_BUG_ID_8042123

        public static final boolean JDK_BUG_ID_8042123
        Support default methods in JDI. See JDK-8042123

      • JDK_BUG_EVENT_CONTROLLER_LEAK

        public static final boolean JDK_BUG_EVENT_CONTROLLER_LEAK
        Enable a workaround for JDK bug with leaking TargetVM.EventController, see IDEA-163334

      • JDK_BUG_ID_6822627

        public static final boolean JDK_BUG_ID_6822627
        NPE from com.sun.jdi.ReferenceType#constantPool() See JDK-6822627

      • JDK_BUG_ID_21275177

        public static final boolean JDK_BUG_ID_21275177
        Debugger hangs in trace mode with TRACE_SEND when method argument is a StringReference
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • JDK_BUG_WITH_TRACE_SEND

        public static final boolean JDK_BUG_WITH_TRACE_SEND
        Debugger hangs in trace mode with TRACE_SEND when method argument is a ThreadReference
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • JDK_MAC_FONT_STYLE_DETECTION_WORKAROUND

        public static final boolean JDK_MAC_FONT_STYLE_DETECTION_WORKAROUND
        JDK on Mac detects font style for system fonts based only on their name (PostScript name). This doesn't work for some fonts, which don't use recognizable style suffixes in their names. Corresponding JDK request for enhancement - JDK-8139151.

      • JDK_MAC_FONT_STYLE_BUG

        public static final boolean JDK_MAC_FONT_STYLE_BUG
        Older JDK versions could mistakenly use derived italics font, when genuine italic font was available in the system. The issue was fixed in JDK 1.8.0_60 as part of JDK-8064833.

      • JDK_BUG_ID_8032832

        public static final boolean JDK_BUG_ID_8032832
        Some HTTP connections lock class loaders: https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8032832 The issue claims to be fixed in 8u20, but the fix just replaces one lock with another (on a context class loader).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • JDK_BUG_ID_8147994

        public static final boolean JDK_BUG_ID_8147994
        Since 8u102, AWT supports Shift-scroll on all platforms (before, it only worked on macOS). Ultimately fixed by JDK-8147994.

      • TEXT_LAYOUT_IS_SLOW

        public static final boolean TEXT_LAYOUT_IS_SLOW
        https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8220231

        public static boolean isJdkBugId8004103()
        XToolkit.getScreenInsets() may be very slow. See https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8170937.
